Articles.Content:
• Occasionally cannot decouple
  • Cannot create or edit maneuver node in 0x Speed
  • When using infinite fuel cheat with an empty tank as the only source, the engine acts as if it is off while under timewarp
  • Sky and Water totally absent
  • Landing legs causing uncontrollable spinning when leaving timewarp
  • Landing legs falling off after timewarp/load (from quicksave OR tracking station)
  • Orbit line disappearing after a quick load/vessel swap
  • Upon load from tracking station, chance of vessel clipping through ground and falling
